b:if.cond: data:title != "{ads}" and not (data:widget.type == "HTML" and data:title contains "getMailchimp")

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:class.expr:name: data:skin.vars.gridstyle == "1px" ? "post hentry item-" + data:i : "post hentry item-" + data:i

div.p: This gadget is no longer available.

head.script: (function() {function signalGooglefcPresent() {if (!window.frames['googlefcPresent']) {if (document.body) {const iframe = document.createElement('iframe'); iframe.style = 'width: 0; height: 0; border: none; z-index: -1000; left: -1000px; top: -1000px;'; iframe.style.display = 'none'; iframe.name = 'googlefcPresent'; document.body.appendChild(iframe);} else {setTimeout(signalGooglefcPresent, 0);}}}signalGooglefcPresent();})();

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:class.expr:name: data:skin.vars.gridstyle == "1px" ? "post hentry item-" + data:i : "post hentry item-" + data:i

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "xdfcb-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Responsive Advertisement

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:include.data: { buttonClass: "flat-button", limit: 1, items: data:this.data, itemSet: "data", itemsMarkup: "super.hierarchy" }
b:include.name: extendableItems

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Thanks for coming to this website! More content will be added over the coming days, weeks and months.

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Based in the UK, this privacy-focused, open-source platform offers a wealth of resources, including acclaimed revision cheat sheets, links to top-rated revision resources, games development projects, Minecraft servers, a technical blog, and much more. Plus, with open-source development guidance and public APIs, iBaguette is committed to making your experience better. Check out the site for custom Discord bots, a desktop application called DraggieTools, and information about our YouTube channel.
